TopicTitle: [1.0.5] ScreenMessageHider. Hides screen messages when F2 is pressed

Articles.Content:
ScreenMessageHider

ScreenMessageHider is a very simple mod that hides ScreenMessages that don't normally get hidden when pressing F2

Like these:

![objcqXO.jpg](http://imgur.com/objcqXO.jpg)

And these:

![AYLEqbt.jpg](http://imgur.com/AYLEqbt.jpg)

It's so simple (<50 lines of code) that I'm surprised it's not stock.

**Download:** [http://spacedock.info/mod/169/ScreenMessageHider](http://spacedock.info/mod/169/ScreenMessageHider)

**Or:** [https://github.com/HappyFaceIndustries/ScreenMessageHider/releases/latest](https://github.com/HappyFaceIndustries/ScreenMessageHider/releases/latest)

Or on **CKAN**

**Source:** [https://github.com/HappyFaceIndustries/ScreenMessageHider](https://github.com/HappyFaceIndustries/ScreenMessageHider)

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
